data.apiNameCn: 国内按航段变更费计算（订单）
data.introduce: 国内按航段变更费计算订单（AirRepriceBySegOrder）为用户提供了基于航段信息组的国内变更价查询服务。
data.business: 国内单程、联程等类型的变更价计算。
data.functions:
支持改期及换开的变更费计算
支持对国内Reshop结果进行验价
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirRepriceBySegOrderRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"国内按航段变更费计算请求信息(订单)","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"销售点信息：C\\B","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"airlinecode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"换开航司：发起换开请求的换开航空公司代码：如果为航空公司网站（包括B2B/B2C/B2G），则由网站提供此航空公司代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"iatacode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"Iata号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"CityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"城市代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"PCC：代理人office号，如PEK099","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"PreviousOrderID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"前序订单号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"RePriceBySegInfos","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"RePriceBySegInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"退改签明细","children":[{"name":"FlightSegments","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"operationCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"实际承运航空公司信息：例：CA","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司代码（例如：MU）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司名称","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班号（例如：1831）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"departure","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"起飞机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码：机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航站楼","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"登机口","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"arrival","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Terminal","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航站楼","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Gate","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"出站口","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@BaggageClaim","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"取行李处","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@Diversion","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"equipment","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"机型","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"飞机型号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"marketingCarrier","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"代码上下文","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@CompanyShortName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司名称","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"flightno","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"departureTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"起飞时间","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"arrivalTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"到达时间","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"type","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航段类型：AIRSEG_ARNK AIRSEG_NORMAL AIRSEG_OPEN","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"actionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"行动代码","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"cabin","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"仓位","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"TicketNumber_Before","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"旧票号：13 位校验，可以带-","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PayType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"支付方式：(支持CC/CASH)","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"IsInfant","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否是婴儿","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassName","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"姓名","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassID","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"旅客序号：如P1","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"PassCount","type":"int","quantity":"1","description":"旅客数量","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"InvoluntaryIdentifier","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否是非自愿","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@SysType","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"系统类型","children":[],"default":"C"}],"default":""}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirRepriceBySegOrderRQ>
    <POS>
        <Source>
            <airlinecode>CA</airlinecode>
            <iatacode>08385252</iatacode>
            <CityCode>BJS</CityCode>
            <PseudoCityCode>BJS187</PseudoCityCode>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <PreviousOrderID>2209281103391ed55e4</PreviousOrderID>
    <RePriceBySegInfos>
        <RePriceBySegInfo>
            <FlightSegments>
                <!-- 新航段信息 -->
                <FlightSegment>
                    <departure LocationCode="PEK"/>
                    <arrival LocationCode="SHA"/>
                    <equipment AirEquipType="359"/>
                    <marketingCarrier Code="CA"/>
                    <operationCarrier Code="CA"/>
                    <departureTime>2022-10-21T07:30:00</departureTime>
                    <arrivalTime>2022-10-21T10:00:00</arrivalTime>
                    <type>NORMAL</type>
                    <flightno>CA1831</flightno>
                    <cabin>J</cabin>
                    <actionCode>HK</actionCode>
                </FlightSegment>
            </FlightSegments>
            <!-- 原票号 -->
            <TicketNumber_Before>999-6921928109</TicketNumber_Before>
            <IsInfant>false</IsInfant>
            <PassName>TEST/ADT</PassName>
            <InvoluntaryIdentifier>false</InvoluntaryIdentifier>
        </RePriceBySegInfo>
    </RePriceBySegInfos>
</OTA_AirRepriceBySegOrderRQ>
